listing.listing_description: Located in Punta Mita Resort’s gated community, surrounded by the holes of Jack Nicklaus’ picturesque golf course, Villa Paraiso is ready to make your vacation dreams a reality. Perfect for a golf retreat with friends and family, this private luxury villa has all the amenities and easy access to all of Punta Mita’s prized attractions.From the outside, Villa Paraiso looks bright, vibrant, and inviting. The blue of the sky matches the crystal water of the pool. Lush greenery surrounds the private backyard terrace. And, the clay tiled roof, wooden posts and beams, and rich earthy tones are the epitome of Mexican design. Inside, you’ll find the same warm inviting ambience, with a few touches of modern elegance. The spacious living room has openings on both sides, allowing fresh ocean breeze to passively ventilate the interior space. Comfortable couches and armchairs are great places to lounge after a long day on the golf course. At dinner, the dining area has space for eight, and if you need some extra place settings, the kitchen’s breakfast bar can fit three more. Also in the kitchen, you'll enjoy high end appliances and an “L” shaped granite countertop.Another amazing setting for a dinner soiree is Paraiso’s terrace. Outside, guest will love the alfresco dining area. Prepare meals inside, or, make use of Paraiso’s barbecue and wet bar. After dinner, there are plenty of great little furnished outdoor areas for guests to socialize, lounge, and relax. And, if the mood hits, go for a nighttime dip in Paraiso’s beautiful swimming pool.Within Punta Mita’s estate you’ll have access to two golf courses, both designed by legendary golfer Jack Nicklaus. With holes stretching down the coast line, these courses are as scenic as they are challenging. You’ll also have access to Punta Mita’s beach club, tennis and fitness facilities, shops and restaurants, and their luxurious spa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located within Diamante Resort’s private beach community, with an amazing view of the golf course, this luxury villa is just minutes from so many great amenities. Whether you’re looking to spend your day on the course, the beach, or in the city, Beach Estate thirty-seven will have you there with ease. Perfect for a larger family vacation, a golf trip with friends, or a small corporate retreat, this private villa has sleeping accommodations for ten and plenty of social space to explore throughout the property.This modern beach house easily opens to the terrace, inviting natural sunlight and ocean breeze to flow throughout its spacious interior. An open concept layout and a minimalistic approach to design creates a simple, yet chic, space for your vacation. The decor is high end electronics, designer furniture, and eclectic local art. There are plenty of different social areas for guests to gather, or find solitude. The kitchen is loaded with state of the art stainless steel appliances and a functional atmosphere.Inside, there’s formal dining for ten, a breakfast bar, Wi-Fi, television, and the villa comes with housekeeping every other day. On the terrace, the swimming pool and hot tub are perfect for relaxing and rejuvenating after a long day on the course. There’s also an outdoor kitchen and barbecue on the terrace, great for sneaking away for a quick lunch before you head back to the course. Some of Diamante’s other amenities include, Crystal Lagoon, spa and wellness centre, fitness facilities, beach club, and on-site restaurants and bars.A few minutes away in Cabo San Lucas, you’ll find international restaurants, beachfront bars, shopping, and a vibrant nightlife scene. Medano beach is close as well, there you’ll find a bustling tourism scene, great for first time surfers. If you’re a golf aficionado, The Dunes course at Diamante, designed by Davis Love III, is one of Golf Magazine’s “Best Courses in the World”. And, El Cardonal, designed by Tiger Woods, is on Diamante’s estate as well. A challenging eighteen with several strategic options for each hole.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Contemporary cool meets the hot-and-sunny Turks and Caicos beach scene at Big Chill Villa. This all-suite luxury vacation rental boasts a waterfront setting on a canal in the exclusive Leeward area, within walking distance of top-ranked Grace Bay Beach. Use its six sleek bedrooms to host a family reunion or for a Caribbean holiday with a group of six couples.The villa’s expansive outdoor living areas are laid out around a large pool with a shallow section perfect for children. Lounge and dine al-fresco, serve refreshments from the wet bar and prep dinner on the barbecue. Or follow the steps to the private dock on the canal, where you can take the provided kayaks out on the water or arrange for a charter boat to pick you up.Huge sliding glass doors blur the line between the outdoor living areas and the indoor great room of Big Chill. Push them open to let the warm breezes waft through the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, or close the drapes and switch on the air conditioning if the sun gets too hot. While the architecture is streamlined and modern, natural-fiber area rugs and brightly colored dining chairs keep the spaces warm and inviting.There are four bedrooms in the villa’s main house: three with king beds, and one with a queen bed and twin bed. The other two bedrooms have a king bed and two twin beds, respectively, and are located in a guest house that’s ideal for a small family or a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.From Big Chill Villa, it’s a quick trip by boat down the Leeward canals to the bay for a fishing or snorkeling excursion, and a short walk to Grace Bay Beach, whose white sands and turquoise waters have been voted the best in the world several times over. If you need ingredients for dinner or are craving a coffee, make the half-mile trip to the Leeward Settlement Market.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Feel hot, hot, hot with a holiday at Casa Buena Suerte - Soliman Bay. Not only is this beautiful Tulum vacation rental set on a sunny stretch of pristine beach, it’s located in one of the trendiest spots in the Riviera Maya. Invite up to twelve of your coolest friends to fill its six bedrooms, or let the attentive staff pamper you and your extended family.As part of your stay at this luxury property, you’ll book meal service with a talented chef, sous chef and server, and a villa manager and housekeeper will see to your needs. Spend your days listening to the waves or soaking in the sun from the infinity pool or beachfront lounging and dining areas. In the evenings, settle into the home theater or share photos via Wi-Fi.From its Instagram-ready pink walls to its charming sections of thatched roof, Casa Buena Suerte is a feast for the eyes. Its living and dining rooms are bold and beautiful, filled with details like striped fabric, unique artwork and marble-topped tables. There’s a well-equipped kitchen on the villa’s main level, as well as a smaller kitchen upstairs.There are five bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in a honeymoon-worthy beachfront palapa suite. All five have king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and many have sleeper sofas in case extra accommodations are needed.Set off from the shore in front of Casa Buena Suerte and into the waters of Soliman Bay in the three provided kayaks. If you’re setting off by car instead, it’s a 15-minute drive or less into downtown Tulum, where you’ll find another beach, restaurants and a grocery store, and a 20-minute drive to the nearest golf course. Don’t miss the chance to tour the area’s famed Mayan ruins overlooking the ocean and the jungle.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Relax and enjoy a view of endless Caribbean blue at the edge Villa Amarilla’s infinity pool. Located in Anguilla, this five bedroom architectural gem boasts a décor as beautiful as the island’s natural surroundings, created in collaboration with award-winning interior designer David Salem.Whether you are basking in the sun in one of the pool’s built-in recliners, enjoying the built-in hot tub’s soothing bubbles or entertaining fellow vacationers, you’ll love the outdoor amenities Villa Amarilla has to offer. Indulge in the island’s fresh seafood with the help of a barbeque grill and shaded terrace, or sip a cocktail by the outdoor bar. Indoors, you will find a home theatre with surround sound, an excercise room and a massage table. Baby equipment is also available, to accommodate the whole family and help you travel light. Housekeeping, concierge and manager services are included with your reservation.Villa Amarilla’s exterior impresses with yellow stucco walls, terracotta tiles and vast terraces that are perfectly in tune with Anguilla’s sunny coastline. Step inside and you will discover that its vaulted ceilings house a tastefully decorated and well-lit interior vast enough for a large group. A well-equipped kitchen and large center island make preparing the meals you’ll be enjoying in the villa’s spacious indoor and outdoor dining areas a breeze. Alternatively, you can count on our Concierge service to book a private chef for you. A large glass dining table makes Villa Amarilla the perfect place to enjoy a special moment with your loved ones.Five exquisite bedrooms and six and a half bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests at Villa Amarilla. All of the bedrooms include colorful en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and media centers. Three of the suites also feature alfresco showers. Fall asleep to the sound of ocean waves and wake up to nothing but blue skies!Located on one of Anguilla’s most beautiful reefs, you will never tire of the mesmerizing view of the surf breaking and the panoramic views of Shoal Bay and Scrub Island. Known for its pristine white sand beaches and clear turquoise seas, Anguilla offers a casual island tempo so you can get the rest and relaxation you deserve. Whether on the island for fun in the sun, fine dining, nightlife or watersports, Villa Amarilla offers a one of a kind holiday experience for the Caribbean traveler.Copyright © 2014 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Le Moulin ("The Mill") is situated directly on St. Jean Beach along the north coast of St. Barts, just minutes from Gustavia. Named for the restored, antique mill on the estate (which now houses the master bedroom suite), the beachfront villa offers a superb blend of vintage Caribbean elegance and high-end modern comfort. Its ample estate includes an outdoor swimming pool, alfresco dining, and generous space for open-air relaxation, while the cool, spacious interiors feature lovely living and dining areas and a gourmet kitchen. Three superb bedroom suites (including the ocean-view moulin with private entrance) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.The villa is nestled amid palm trees against the beach's soft sands, with expansive views of the turquoise bay and sea. Lounge chairs line the long infinity pool, while the spacious, wrap-around veranda features multiple dining tables and sitting areas—inviting you to relish home-cooked meals and sip island cocktails in the enchanting breeze.Several sets of arched French doors open from the main villa to the veranda, inhaling the sea-kissed air into the home. The cavernous living room offers a dreamy, airy ambiance, with high, vaulted ceilings of natural wood, superb modern furnishings and décor, and lovely curtains. The light-filled kitchen features chef-grade appliances and spacious prep areas, with luminous white walls complementing the wood ceilings and sleek surfaces. It opens directly to the ten-person dining table on the back patio.The master suite is set within the old mill, with French doors opening to a furnished terrace and the sandy beach. The room enjoys beautiful ocean views and features a comfortable queen bed and ensuite bathroom. In the main villa, the primary guest suite features a king bed and opens to the terrace, while the second guest suite has a split-king bed (or two twin beds). Both enjoy ensuite bathrooms with dual vanities.Le Moulin balances exquisite seclusion with a highly convenient location within minutes of Gustavia and the international airport. In addition to St. Jean Beach bordering your estate, several of the island's finest beaches are within easy reach. Guided boat tours embark from Gustavia for the sublime Saint Barthelemy Natural Reserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the heart of Gustavia, positioned to capture the sun setting over the ocean, minutes from world class beaches, boutiques and restaurants, this luxury vacation rental has everything you could ask for.With accommodations for eight, formal dining for ten, and an abundance of indoor and outdoor space, this beautiful private villa is perfect for vacationing with family and friends. Features include a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, Sonos sound system, satellite television, and a wine cellar. Outside on the balcony you’ll find plenty of space to lounge around the infinity pool and watch the sun set in one of many relaxing outdoor living areas.Axel Rocks is a truly breathtaking example of modern architecture. Clean sight lines, minimalistic designer furnishings and large open-concept common areas show off a simple sophistication that is so hard to get right. But it’s not just right, it’s perfect. Subtle placements of color direct your attention around the villa highlighting its unique features, while floor to ceiling glass windows and doors let the ocean view remain the focal point of your stay.Each one of the four bedrooms at Axel Rocks has a queen sized bed, furnished private terrace, an ocean view, ensuite bathroom, satellite TV, and a mini fridge. All of the fixtures and appliances are absolutely top of the line both in form and function.Nearby, you’ll find plenty of options for day or night excursions. Walk the Colombier Beach Trail and find yourself on a secluded beach with seemingly crystal clear water, only accessible by foot and boat. Later, watch the sun go down from a beach front lounge, or dance the night away at one of Gustavia’s many exciting clubs, all within minutes of the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Like a brilliant ivory sculpture hovering above a sparkling turquoise sea, you will find Villa Sol y Luna, a spectacular luxury retreat located in Ocean Point, Turks and Caicos. Located atop a short cliff along the majestic oceanfront, this vacation rental is located just a two minute walk from fabulous Taylor Bay Beach. Whether it’s time for the sun or moon to shine, this private villa has got you covered!Enjoy a refreshing dip in the pristine waters of the infinity swimming pool—any time of day! You will also find a hot tub on the terrace, perfect for a midnight soak with your favorite cocktail in hand. Ideal for the consummate entertainer, other exterior perks at Villa Sol y Luna include a barbeque, a lovely alfresco dining set, a bar and a rooftop terrace. You will also find plenty of sun loungers, an alfresco shower and a lush garden. The interiors at Villa Sol y Luna provide a television, surround sound and Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes a mid-week cleaning service.Kick back in the spacious living room with comfortable white seating and a television. The open plan includes a formal dining area with a glass table and a spectacular view of the sea. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen features a convenient and stylish breakfast bar.Two exquisite bedrooms and a trundle bed accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking villa. Both bedrooms offer en-suite bathrooms, televisions, ocean views and access to a private balcony overlooking the sea. The master suite provides a king size bed, dual vanity and jetted tub.Whether for a family holiday or a decadent honeymoon, Villa Sol y Luna makes a great bet. You will also be within driving distance of iconic Grace Bay and the Provo Golf Club. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. As you gaze at the brilliant turquoise waters of the sea, little could compare to the sublime vibrations to be experienced at this bijou villa!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A dramatic, winding hillside road delivers you to Terrasse de Mer, set high above the beach and civilization. It’s an exotic and private oasis. The moment you enter the large courtyard; you are in the midst of a stunning 360-degree view. Behind you are neighboring mountains; in front of you is Anguilla, so close you can touch it. Enter the front door and a brilliant, variegated scene flows before you, painted in greens and blues. Within your scope are the verdant island peaks, Baie Rouge Beach and Marigot with its poetic marinas. The sightline stretches to Creole Rock in Grand Case and beyond to the Atlantic’s horizon. The sapphire sea is everywhere.Expansive terraces and covered spaces, for dining and lounging, surround the beautiful heated pool perched at the terrace’s edge. The natural vistas from the pool create a secluded atmosphere. A wall of sea side columns anchors the view and frames Anguilla. Parallel to Anguilla, above Baie Rouge Beach, is a long terrace with two gazebos, each with sliding glass doors; one with a hot tub.The spacious main living area, featuring new furniture, is comfortable and stylish. The view is amazing! The décor throughout the interior has a romantic, elegant attitude in white, cream and Indonesian teak accented with charming exotic accessories. Just off the main room, the inviting French county kitchen looks out to the sea connecting the chef to nature. Dine inside off the terrace or at the high kitchen counter.The four bedrooms with en suite bathrooms are equal size and air conditioned. Two are connected to the main house. One is off the terrace and the other in a private casita off the courtyard. The bathrooms are spacious with garden or sea views.You are secluded yet close to amenities. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case, 10 minutes to the international airport and 30 minutes to Philipsburg's shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Find peace and tranquility at Residence du Cap, an elegant two story villa perched high in the hills of the private Cap Estate: a 1,500 acre property on the grounds of an old sugar plantation. See the best of St. Lucia without leaving your terrace, with views across Pigeon Island to the Caribbean Sea. On a clear day the neighboring island of Martinique is visible on the horizon, as are the famous Pitons mountains.Between the main villa and the two storey guest cottage, a beautiful tiled terrace attracts sun all day. Spend afternoons reclined in cushioned sunloungers that surround the diamond-shaped pool. When it’s time to cool off, a sleek, columned veranda wraps its way around the main house providing plenty of cozy seating options. As the sun begins to set, head towards the balustered railing with a cocktail and watch boats twinkle along the darkening horizon.Inside, a lively color palette of green and fuchsia, plus light streaming in through French doors and windows create a breezy tropical feel. The villa’s main room is laid out along an open concept plan, allowing guests to enjoy each other’s presence whether lounging in the living area or preparing a memorable meal in the fully-equipped, modern kitchen. Off the kitchen is a beautiful wooden dining table that seats eight people.Three of Residence du Cap’s bedrooms are on the upper floor of the main house. Each bright rooms contains an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning and is individually styled with designer linens and furnishings. The final bedroom is found in the self-contained guest cottage, with its own deck, living room and kitchen.Residence du Cap is only minutes from St. Lucia’s best 18 holes of golf, as well as numerous sandy beaches, all found within Cap Estate. Rodney Bay, the island’s social centre, is only 6.4 km away. From its marina you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to Pitons and Sulphur Springs. The town of Gros Islet is where you’ll find upscale shopping, fine dining and nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take the chance to truly get away from it all at Sailrock Resort Ocean View 2 Bedroom Suite A. Set on the island of South Caicos, this brand-new luxury property is far from the bustle of Providenciales, but still has the incredible white sand and turquoise waters for which Turks and Caicos is famous. The gorgeous, tranquil location and five-star service will make for an unforgettable honeymoon or quiet holiday with family and friends.Your stay at Sailrock Resorts begins with an airport transfer and includes a full American-style breakfast each day. Guests are welcome at the resort’s pool and hot tub, but there’s plenty of space to enjoy the sun in private on the villa’s wraparound deck, stocked with loungers. Stay active in the fitness room, or indulge in select treatments at the Na Spa.The Ocean View 2 Bedroom Suite A is laid out around a central open-plan great room. Two walls of sliding glass doors frame views of the hillside and ocean—and open the space to the wraparound deck—while a vaulted ceiling lends a breezy feel. The modern furnishings have a comfortable, casual feel, from the natural-fiber area rug to wire-framed lounge chairs. There’s both a fully equipped kitchen with a dining table and a separate kitchenette perfect for popping in from the beach for refreshments.This idyllic vacation rental has just over 2,500 square feet of living space and can accommodate four. Both of its bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to private sections of the deck; one suite has a king bed and the other has two twin beds.Known for its beaches, fishing and scuba diving, South Caicos is a wonderful destination for a quiet getaway. Spend your days strolling down to the beach and stretching out, or, if you’d like to explore the island, drive into sleepy Cockburn Harbour or visit the abandoned salinas that were once home to a thriving salt industry.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Arawak is the perfect vacation rental to share with friends. With two master bedrooms on either side of the shared living space, privacy is always easy to find. Facing west and positioned on the hillside of Point Milou, this private luxury villa was built specifically to capture the sun setting over an outstanding ocean view. Close by you’ll find many world renowned beaches, and St. Bart’s capital, Gustavia.It’s easy to let the day breeze by, soaking in the infinity pool, watching sailboats navigate their way through the surrounding islands. Maybe have a barbeque for lunch and then a formal dinner inside later, with seating for eight Arawak is great for hosting too.From the couch to the terrace, to the pool and beyond, the spaces at Arawak merge seamlessly. Standing on the terrace looking back into the living room will allow you to truly appreciate the symmetrical design of this villa. Contemporary furniture and decorations give Arawak a sophisticated elegance. Subtle tones and wooden accents allow the vibrant colors of the natural surroundings to be the dominant focal point of your Caribbean vacation.The bedrooms at Arawak are nearly identical. Thoughtfully located on either side of the Villa for privacy, they both feature spectacular ocean views furnished outdoor private patios, ensuite bathrooms with rain showers, and queen sized beds. Each bedroom also has satellite television, a desk, safe, and a mini-fridge, making them a relaxing hideaway at the end of a beautiful day.Nearby, about a twenty minute drive, you’ll find the town of Gustavia. Rich in historical landmarks and an architecture molded by numerous colonial regimes, Gustavia, now French territory, is home to some of the world’s finest dining, boutique shops, and colorful nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located on the waterfront of Simpson Bay Lagoon in beautiful St. Martin, villa Amarylis is the perfect setting to make your Caribbean vacation dreams come true. Situated within a gated community, just minutes from the island’s most popular nightlife spots, you’ll have no trouble enjoying the lagoon’s peaceful, secluded atmosphere, even with such great proximity to Maho. Within a few minutes drive, you’ll find golf, beachfront, and nightlife.When the view is this good, you’ll want to make sure nothing gets in the way, and that’s exactly how Amarylis is laid out. From the swimming pool to the living room couch, you’ll have incredible views of Simpson’s Bay Lagoon. The white-washed color scheme and stately decor create an atmosphere that is both relaxing, and elegant, making Amarylis the perfect host for any occasion.Amarylis is outfitted with top of the line tech features, including a Smart television, integrated sound system, and Wi-Fi. The fully equipped kitchen, backyard barbeque, and formal and alfresco dining areas make it easy to host special family dinners. When it’s time to retire for the evening, you’ll have four lagoon-view bedrooms with queen beds, ensuites, and access to the terrace, as well as a private entrance kids room with queen bed and ensuite.Feel like exploring the lagoon? Consider a snorkeling or scuba diving tour, or better yet, rent a boat and create your own tour. Villa Amarylis comes with a private dock, so popping in for a swim, and renting or chartering a boat is a breeze. If there’s a golfer in the crew, Mullett Bay Golf Course is six minutes from home. For a day on the beach, a night of dancing, or a trip to the casino, Maho Beach is where you’ll find the island’s most exciting nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exquisite St. Barts villa is situated near the St. Jean quartier of Saint Barthelemy, about two minutes on foot from Nikki Beach, and enjoys panoramic views of the St. Jean Bay and Caribbean Sea. Minimalist in design, the villa exudes and accentuates the natural beauty St. Barts, with superb alfresco living spaces, cool and spacious interiors, and four king bedroom suites.Nestled on a hilltop among lush tropical flora, the villa's terrace sets the stage for open-air relaxation and entertainment. Play in the infinite swimming pool overlooking expansive vistas, and soak in the rays on elegant loungers and sunbeds. Sip cocktails in the comfy lounge, cooled by the gentle shade of the wood pergola. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, rinse off in the alfresco shower and kindle the grill in the ample outdoor kitchen. Linger outside at sunset and at night, savoring the sea breeze.An open glass wall invites a lovely alfresco ambiance throughout the open-concept interior. Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, gathering around the rustic wood dinning table for eight, and sip digestifs in the sumptuous, sea-view lounge. Vaulted wood ceilings with exposed beams, hanging fans, and lovely lamps create an exquisite island ambiance.The bedrooms are wonderfully outfitted to provide couples and individuals with serene and cozy sanctuaries. Each features a king bed, ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, desk, safe, and high-end media amenities. Smooth stone floors, elegant furnishings, and sea and garden views cast a dreamy spell over your downtime hours.Varuna enjoys a fabulous balance of seclusion and convenience. Walk about 300 paces to Nikki Beach and less than a kilometer to the beach and nightlife at St. Jean Bay. With the airport only 1.5 kilometers from your door, Varuna is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or weekend getaways.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend a vacation to remember at this waterfront home that offers some of the most beautiful views in all of Bonaire. A small Dutch Caribbean island famous for its year round temperate, gorgeous sunsets and fantastic coral reefs, Bonaire has earned the nickname “Divers Paradise” for good reason. With such creative names as Alice in Wonderland, 1000 Steps and Weber’s Joy, squids, rays and seahorses are some of the countless curious creatures you will see as you explore the pristine turquoise waters around Punto Perfecto.Punto Perfecto is set right on the ocean, giving you panoramic ocean views throughout the estate. Soak in the fiery patterns of the majestic sunsets in the evenings. The backyard is made up of a multi-level terrace, where you can spend a lazy afternoon reading under the thatch-roofed gazebo, fire up the grill for a casual lunch or go for a swim in the saltwater pool. Feel like testing out your snorkeling gear? The villa’s steps lead directly to the ocean!The expansive interior spaces at Punto Perfecto include an open air living room with plenty of seating for you and your guests. The decor is minimalistic and uncluttered, with modern furnishings and exotic accent pieces. On the top floor, the kitchen comes fully equipped and leads onto a covered deck with open air dining facilities. Indoors, you will find a media room, satellite television, DVD player, Wi-Fi and laundry facilities, so you should feel right at home in this spectacular tropical climate. Housekeeping and a villa manager are included with your reservation.Four genial bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Punto Perfecto. All of the bedrooms include double beds and air conditioning, and there is one master suite. Access to the outdoors is a breeze!Go snorkeling right in front of the villa or choose from dozens of exceptional dive sites just minutes away. Spend a day windsurfing on the lagoon or visit one of the island’s white sand beaches. Punto Perfecto is just a short drive to the city of Kralendijk with its selection of international restaurants. And if you can’t get enough wildlife in the sea, nearby Washington Slagbaai Park, the first nature sanctuary of the Netherlands Antilles, houses colorful beauties like flamingo, iguana and that regal bird of prey, the “Wara Wara.”Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This airy hilltop villa offers a jaw-dropping view of the Cruz Bay area. As a sea breeze blows up from the turquoise water of Caneel Bay below, guests can spy sailboats and nearby islands cutting through the stunning blue seascape. The villa’s pool, carved stone interiors, wet bar, and fully-equipped entertainment system round out the welcome, as the island’s beaches and bars beckon from below.Privacy is built into the DNA of the villa, with no neighbouring buildings and a completely private gated entrance, allowing guests to soak up the leafy, natural ambience of the Virgin Islands National Park (which the property sits adjacent to) in total seclusion. Recline in serenity in the villa’s shady courtyard, or take up a prime sunbathing position in the supplied recliners that dot the poolside terrace. With a media room and fully-outfitted living room, guests can enjoy the comforts of this roomy villa in any way they see fit, before taking to the alfresco dining area for an evening barbecue of stunningly-fresh, locally-caught fish, complete with island delicacies and produce.Isla Vista also offers easy access to a number of renowned beaches, such as Honeymoon Beach, where crystal clear water and sea turtles abound. Guests can wile away the sunlit days on these beaches, or take a chartered cruise to dive under the waves, experiencing schools of tropical fish and majestic rays via professional guided outings. The buzzing town of Cruz Bay, complete with energy-filled bars and some of the finest seafood restaurants in the Carribean are just a few minutes away. After a fun night out, return to the peaceful ambience of the villa, and savor a refreshing cocktail as the lights of the town below flicker and moonlight plays on the waves of the sea below. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Offering one of the finest views in the US Virgin Islands, the ocean panorama that stretches before guests at Mango Bay is simply unforgettable. Taking your eyes off the view, you’ll be drawn to the cooling rooftop pool, the comfortable, spacious interior, and the peace of the shady patio. Taking to the laneways and exploring the island’s beaches and tropical hillsides is a life-affirming treat.From both the covered upper terrace and lower sun-deck, guests can truly take in an eagle-eye view of the ocean and surf-studded Cinnamon Bay. Enjoy a paradise of greens and blues, as the water stretches out to the hazy outline of wild islands beyond, only occasionally marked by the stark white wakes of boats that appear tiny amidst the natural splendor. Taking a break inside, the rich, sloped wooden interior roof provides an almost church-like sense of peace, while the marble-lined and tiled bathrooms and walk-in showers are a godsend for a refreshing cool-down after a day on the beach or exploring the island. On the private patio, guests can stroll through the villa’s stone arches, sip coffee, or lunch in the cool shadows as a riot of tropical plants and flowers climb the sides of the villa, while fruit bats flit above at dusk. The barbecue area, complete with dabbled sun-frame above, casts an inventive criss-crossed shadow across group gatherings at mealtimes. Beaches, including the stunning Trunk Bay beach, are only a very short drive away. Set out across the postcard-perfect sand, or enter the dazzling blue water, where schools of fish dart by in the stunningly clear water. To the west, visit the tropical bars and seaside restaurants of Cruz Bay. If that gem-blue sea has cast a spell on you, indulge in a private yacht cruise, engage in thrilling off-shore sport fishing, or even delve under the waves with turtles, rays and seahorses on an action-packed scuba or snorkeling expedition. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Incredible architecture meets breathtaking views at the aptly named La Escapa. This newly built Costa Rica vacation rental overlooks the ocean from the Peninsula Papagayo, which is home to stunning beaches and world-class golf but not too far from the wild landscape of several national parks. Invite up to a dozen friends or family members to join you on a memorable holiday in this unique setting.Tropical gardens and tranquil water features set a peaceful tone for a stay at this villa, while expansive outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, lounging and dining areas, a wet bar and a gas barbecue invite you to make the most of the warm weather and ocean views. After a day out in the sun or at the beach, relax in the media room or share photos of your adventures via Wi-Fi.High ceilings and nearly full-height windows let the warm breezes float through the villa's open-concept interiors. Neutral tones and an eclectic mix of modern furnishings and exotic accent pieces make for living and dining areas that are chic yet comfortable. The generously sized, fully equipped kitchen has both a statement-making copper range hood and a convenient island as its centerpiece.La Escapa has three bedrooms with king beds and al-fresco showers and one bedroom with a queen bed; all four have en-suite bathrooms and open to terraces overlooking the ocean. For larger parties, there are two additional rooms with a full bed and two twin bunk beds, respectively.Your stay at this luxury property includes access to the nearby Palmer Signature golf course, the tennis facility at the Four Seasons and the private sanctuary of Prieta Beach Club, where you can sit down to a honeymoon-worthy oceanfront dinner or indulge in a spa treatment. The villa is also a short drive from several other beaches, including Poro Poro Beach Club and Playa Nacascolo, and close enough to the popular beach town of Playa Hermosa for a day trip.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Find out just how blue the ocean can get—and how relaxed you can be—at Villa Aguamarina. Just steps from the beach in the exclusive Porta Fortuna development in the gated Punta Mita community, the three-bedroom villa leaves nothing between you and breathtaking sea views. Paired with the vistas, the property’s unique blend of Zen and Mexican style furnishings creates a serenely stylish atmosphere that will please even the most discerning guests.Villa Aguamarina has its own heated plunge pool, hot tub, and terrace with lounging and dining areas, a barbecue, hammock and al-fresco shower. Thanks to a media room and sound system, you can watch the waves during the day and immerse yourself in the digital movie and music libraries at night. Guests enjoy access to shared amenities in Porta Fortuna like the beach club, restaurant (which provides room service) and yoga studio.The villa’s interiors are sleek and thoughtfully appointed, but never sparse. White walls, pale stone floors and an open-plan layout give the great room a clean, calm feeling that’s warmed up by soft white sofas and an upholstered ottoman in the sitting area and a rich walnut table, chairs and shelves in the dining area. The fully equipped kitchen is a cook’s dream, with granite countertops, Scavolini cabinets and top-of-the-line appliances.The villa has one bedroom on the ground level and two upstairs; all three have en-suite bathrooms with dual vanities. The ground-floor bedroom has 2 Twin over Double size bunk beds and outdoor shower. On the second floor, two bedrooms have king beds. Both have balconies with ocean views.A location within the gated community of Punta Mita means you can easily walk to the beach at Banderas Bay, 1 minute away, a restaurant, 2 minutes away, and the golf course, 10 minutes away. Take the car to Punta Mita Village, 15 minutes away, or Sayulita Village, 19.5 km away, both of which have shopping and dining, or downtown Puerto Vallarta, 46 km away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 44 km to Licenciado Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step onto the picture-perfect hot sands of Ffryes Beach just a few steps to the north of this premium villa, with the calmer but just as picturesque Darkwood Beach lying to the south. Exciting boat trips, diving excursions to coral reefs, and the bright lights and restaurants of St. John’s all beckon from nearby, with an ice-cold drink by the villa’s pool always being a great standby option. Inside the property, with the richly furnished interiors, cooling AC and calming white-and-light color scheme, leaving can justifiably seem like too much work. Indeed, the villa can be your designed place of relaxation, with calming ocean views from the deep and luxurious beds and provided sun-recliners scattered across both the upper and lower patios. After a dip in the oceanside pool, guests can recline and soak up the Carribean sun as the afternoon lulls the senses, with the blue ocean gently lapping at the foot of the property. The level of convenience offered by Tamarind Hills is almost without parallel on Antigua. With such a profusion of amazing beaches close by, guests can leave the villa to claim a spot on the pristine sand, spend an afternoon sunning and swimming, and then stroll to the nearby seaside bars and restaurants for a locally-inspired snack and inventive cocktail - all by foot and in seconds. Guests can easily go to the next level by chartering a sea cruise for a bout of heart-racing sports fishing for marlin or tuna in the blue depths beyond the island, or spend an afternoon reef racing or scuba diving in the blue-green bays along the north of the island. After a day spent building up an appetite, locally-caught lobster or a plate of delicately-flavored fungee tastes extra great at one of the parish’s many relaxed restaurants. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched in the hills of St. Lucia’s exclusive Cap Estate, at the northernmost tip of the island, Villa Decaj is ready for your discovery. Patios and columned terraces wrap this modern Caribbean home while lush green gardens and white latticework fences border the property, offering tranquility and seclusion. A panoramic view stretching from the blue waters of the Atlantic to the Caribbean Sea will draw your eye at all corners of the house.A traditional terracotta deck surrounds a long swimming pool where you’ll spend sun soaked days floating to-and-fro before retreating to a chaise longue. A charming al fresco dining area gives you the perfect excuse to fire up the outdoor grill. Off the pool deck you’ll find a sheltered lounge set and above it, is another outdoor dining option. Both give you a vantage point of the 18-hole championship golf course below.Upstairs, a modern kitchen, with quaint wooden cabinetry, provides a fully-equipped launch pad for culinary explorations. Savor the results at an elegant dining room table that seats eight. Off the kitchen, a cozy living room is furnished with soft leather couches, ideal for melting into as you watch a movie on the flatscreen television or surf the web via Wi-Fi. Downstairs, a second living room that opens onto the main deck reveals its Eastern influences through rattan furniture and hardwood accessories.Up to ten guests will sleep comfortably in Decaj’s five bedrooms. The upper level houses the Master and second bedroom. They both offer a Queen size bed, en-suite bathroom with tub and shower, plus terrace access. Below, the third bedroom also has terrace access and an en-suite bathroom. The final two rooms share a bathroom. All feature air conditioning.Cap Estate puts you minutes away from a wealth of adventure. The island’s best golf course is your neighbor and there are several sandy beaches nearby. You’re only 6.4 km out of Gros Islet, where you’ll find upscale shops, fine dining and a marina where you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to Pitons or Sulphur Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Watch as silhouettes of palm trees sway in the breeze while the sun sets over an amazing ocean view at this Mexican beach villa in Punta Mita. Work on your tan in a sunbed. Cool off in the pool. Then, fix yourself a tropical cocktail at the wet bar. Later, hop in a golf cart to explore Punta Mita’s golf courses, beach clubs, and restaurants. Spanish colonial architecture is king when it comes to beach-luxury. Wall-to-wall openings let the ocean view, warm sunshine, and cool sea breeze flow throughout the entire interior. Any social occasions will benefit from the open-air layout, combining the living room with the terrace lounge, alfresco dining set, and swimming pool. And, the shady courtyard is the perfect place to catch up on some reading. Backyard barbeques are a must at Case Sole. Fire up the grill, grab a beer, and gather on the L-shaped sofa to discuss tomorrow’s strategy on the golf course. At night, warm up by the fire pit or head inside to catch the big game on the Smart TV. If you’ve still got some energy to burn, challenge a friend to a tennis match or hit the fitness center. Wake up early to start your day on the golf course. Designed by the legendary Jack Nicklaus, Punta Mita’s Pacifico course is yet another great way to capture scenic ocean views while you challenge yourself on one of the most loved courses in the country. After your round, dip your feet in the water and enjoy a beachfront cocktail at Pacifico Beach Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched above Ffryes Beach, one of Antigua’s most beautiful stretches of sand, this stylish villa features amazing ocean views from nearly every inch of its interior, balcony, and all four en-suite bedrooms. Located within the Tamarind Hills resort community, you and your guests will love the convenience of this beachside residence, as well as its extensive list of nearby attractions.Tamarind Hills celebrates its beautiful environment with an open-air, open concept design that invites the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to fill its interior spaces. The pure white walls, deep wood tones, and bright contemporary accent pieces create the perfect contrast to the vibrant blues and greens of Antigua while conveying a sophisticated elegance that is ideal for any occasion. On the balcony, you’ll appreciate the extra lounge area, wrap-around infinity pool, daybeds, and a garden.In the morning, you’ll find the fully equipped kitchen’s breakfast bar to be a great spot for a casual meal. When a more formal setting is desirable, the dining table inside features seating for six, as does the alfresco set on the balcony. Inside, you’ll appreciate Wi-Fi, cable television, air conditioning, complimentary parking, and twenty-four-hour security during your amazing beach vacation.Ffryes and Darkwood beaches are both just a five-minute walk from Tamarind Hills, and both offer pristine white sand, crystal clear waters, and beachfront restaurants. For an elegant night out, enjoy dinner at Sheer Rocks, one of the island’s highest-rated dining establishments. If you’d prefer something more casual, visit Jackie O’s or Dennis’s Bar, both are located along the beach and feature extensive cocktail menus and incredible views of the sunset. If you’d like to learn about the island’s colonial history, visit the English Harbour, which is home to most of Antigua’s historical sites. And, if you’re feeling adventurous, head to Green Island, on the northern coast, for a wide range of water sports activities, and lessons.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hide away in a classic Caribbean idyll at Pastels. This charming St. Barts vacation rental pairs traditional tropical architecture with modern materials, for a chic twist on the laid-back island lifestyle. Its location in the Vitet countryside is private and pastoral, but close to several of the island’s best beaches, too.Your holiday at Pastels begins with an escort to the villa, meet-and-greet and welcome gifts. Once you’ve settled in, stretch out on the loungers lining the infinity pool, challenge friends and family at the outdoor ping-pong table, whip up meals with local seafood on the barbecue in the al-fresco kitchen and sit down around the outdoor dining table. Other amenities range from a wine fridge and Wi-Fi to a sound system and air conditioning.French doors lead from the pool terrace into an open-concept living and dining area, whose vaulted ceiling and neutral decor make it feel just as breezy as the outdoor living areas. The adjacent kitchen is fully equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and has more contemporary touches like polished concrete.This luxury property has one bedroom in the main house with a king bed and private balcony. The other three bedrooms are in separate buildings with their own entrances, making them perfect for in-laws seeking quiet or a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. One has a king bed and the other two have two twin beds each. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.A stay at Pastels puts you within easy reach of many of the island’s big-name beaches: Saint Jean Bay, Nikki, Anse des Cayes and more. To get even closer to its natural side, hike along the Colombier Beach Trail or drive then take a boat ride to the Saint Barthelemy Nature Reserve. For shopping and dining options, drive into the island’s charming capital, Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perch at the edge of the waves in contemporary style at Pelican. This newly built St. Barts vacation rental is set just above the Anse des Lézards, with views over the ocean to the green hillsides of the island. Spacious, thoughtfully designed interiors and four suite-style bedrooms can welcome up to eight friends or family members to this tropical idyll—but can also be reserved for a more private, honeymoon-style Caribbean getaway.Listen to the waves and feel the sea spray from an oceanfront terrace with an infinity pool, plenty of sun beds and loungers for soaking in the rays, an al-fresco living area and a gas barbecue. The villa also has a satellite TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and wine cooler to entertain you in the evenings.Sun streams into the villa through the glass wall that fronts the great room, and light bounces off the vaulted ceiling. The open-concept space features a relaxed sitting area, a dining area that seats eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. If you’d like, slide open the doors to the terrace to let the warm island breezes waft through the house.Each of the four bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, TV and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms have ocean views and terraces, and the other two look out over the garden.A holiday at Pelican puts you only a 2-minute drive from the nearest beach at Anse des Cayes and a 5-minute drive from Saint Jean Beach. The villa is also a 5-minute drive from the nearest restaurant, for nights when you’d rather dine out, and a 10-minute drive from Gustavia, the island’s charming capital and home to a host of other shopping and dining options.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rising out of the ocean mist in its half-traditional, half-contemporary glory, Casa Arrecifes feels like a dream. Adorned with thatched palapas and blessed with a curving wall of glass, this oceanfront Cabo San Lucas vacation rental has its own spirited style and soul-stirring views of the waves. Its four bedrooms and extensive outdoor living areas make it the perfect place to spend quality time as a family, whisk your beloved away on an awe-inspiring honeymoon or host an intimate Mexico destination wedding.Your stay at Casa Arrecifes begins (or ends) with a one-way airport transfer. When you arrive—and perhaps every morning after—the first thing you’ll want to do is step out to one of the oceanfront patios or terraces. Stake out a spot on a sun lounger or soak in the pool or in the hot tub, whose rounded shapes make them feel like tidepools. Flip on the sound system to set the mood as you prepare dinner on the barbecue and serve it at the al-fresco dining area. If you’re entertaining, you’ll appreciate the wet bar and espresso machine.The villa’s great room is edged in undulating glass that echoes the shapes of the waves outside—and offers wall-to-wall views of them. In the sitting area, taupe and blue upholstery, a natural-fiber rug and weathered wood accent furniture pick up the colors of the sand and sea just outside, and in the dining area, turquoise chairs and a large round table are vibrant and inviting. Meals are a pleasure for cooks and diners alike in the fully equipped kitchen, which includes a wine fridge, breakfast bar and gorgeous pink stone countertop.It’s not a luxury holiday without standout accommodations, and the four bedrooms at Casa Arrecifes deliver. Each has a king bed (or two twin beds that can be turned into a king) and an en-suite bathroom, and all except one have ocean views and private terraces. Intricately carved headboards and otomi fabric wall hangings give the bedrooms both style and personality; don’t forget to look up to glimpse ceilings playfully painted in vibrant hues like fuchsia and yellow.From your doorstep to the beach it’s a journey of a few seconds, or a little longer if you pause to climb around the rocks on the shore. The villa’s location in the Misiones del Cabo neighborhood puts you close to world-class golf, great dining and lively nightlife in downtown Cabo San Lucas and the area’s other beaches. At the end of your stay, make your connection via Los Cabos International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spot tropical birds and fish around Mangrove Cay from the waterfront Seagrace. This modern Caribbean residence has a resort-worthy pool and lounge area set at the edge of the canal in the Leeward Settlement. When you’ve had enough napping in the Turks and Caicos sunshine, take the kayaks or paddleboard out to explore nearby cays or pedal the bicycles to the white sands of famed Grace Bay Beach. Let the villa’s housekeeper take care of the details while you savor the warm weather from the pool and outdoor living and dining areas, or prep just-caught seafood on the barbecue. After sunset, linger outside around the firepit or gather inside the vacation rental around the smart TV, put a favorite album on the Sonos sound system or share holiday snaps over Wi-Fi. There’s plenty of room for the whole family—or your group of friends—to catch up in the open-concept great room, which has a spacious sitting area, a dining table for 8 and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Three sets of sliding glass doors lead to the outdoor living areas and frame views of the canal. Seagrace has 3 bedrooms with king beds: two with private en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, and one that shares access to a hall bathroom. This luxury residence also has one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and one bedroom with two twin beds that shares the hall bathroom with the king bedroom. Kayaks, a paddleboard and bicycles give you the luxury of exploring the area at your leisure. Paddle out to Mangrove Cay to spot wildlife or to Little Water Cay to meet some of its resident rock iguanas. Cycle to Grace Bay Beach to put your toes in its sugar-like sand and turquoise water or relive your honeymoon over dinner at a restaurant along its shores. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Reserve a chic, contemporary stay in the heart of the Corridor at Garza Blanca Los Cabos - One Bedroom Suite. Part of the sleek Garza Blanca Resort, this vacation rental offers access to luxury resort amenities along with private spaces to unwind. With accommodations for four, it’s perfect for a small family, two couples or one couple on a sunny Mexico honeymoon.Your holiday at Garza Blanca includes meals at the resort, room service and daily housekeeping, and suite guests are welcome at the resort’s shared pool, hot tub and gym. The suite also has a private terrace facing the ocean with a hammock and al-fresco dining for four, as well as a cable TV and Wi-Fi inside.Each One Bedroom Suite is a striking mixture of the new and old, with modern furnishings accented by vintage-inspired details. At the center of the suite is an open-concept great room with a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. A feature wall in distressed mirror bounces light around the space, while a mosaic in the kitchen is based on a cave painting discovered in Baja California.The suite’s bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, TV and air conditioning, and opens directly to a terrace with views of the Sea of Cortez. For larger parties or those wanting more flexible accommodations, there’s also a sofa bed in the living room.Whether you want to lay out in the sun or spend an active stay, it’s easy to do. Garza Blanca Los Cabos is a short drive from Chileno Beach and Santa Maria Bay, and also within easy reach of the Cabo Real Golf Club. Try zip lining or ATV riding in Baja’s beautiful but dusty hills, or book a fishing excursion or sailing charter. For an evening out, plan a gallery walk followed by dinner in charming San Jose del Cabo or a lively night in the bars of Cabo San Lucas.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
